info.name: Vietnam National Petroleum Group
info.description: Vietnam National Petroleum Group, together with its subsidiaries, imports, exports, and trades in petroleum products in Vietnam and internationally. It engages in wholesale of petroleum, petrochemical, and related products; rental and leasing of petroleum transport ships; terminals business to import and export petroleum; wholesale of machine equipment and spare parts for petroleum industry and other industries; construction of water works, mining projects, processing and manufacturing works, and other civil engineering projects; transportation of freight by road; provision of petroleum terminal and jetty services, and insurance services; retail sale of motor fuel at petroleum stations; and other businesses. Vietnam National Petroleum Group was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Hanoi, Vietnam.
